name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Swarm!
attacks.effect: For each Pokemon you have on your Bench with "bee" in its name, this attack does 10 more damage if it is a Basic Pokemon, 20 more if it is a Stage 1 Pokemon, and 40 more if it is a Stage 2 Pokemon.

flavor: Individually these aren't bad, but in a group, they can take down huge targets.
